Items.Title: Oversight - Project Full Enrollment: Are we creating a sustainable model for childcare in NYC?
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Project Full Enrollment: Are we creating a sustainable model for childcare in NYC?

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Administration for Children’s Services to achieve stated goals herein including the creation of (i) a written procedure to be followed before closing centers; (ii) a searchable database for locating centers on the website; (iii) a centralized city waiting list; (iv) a system for reevaluating enrollment and capacity numbers; and (v) a report detailing monthly attendance and enrollment figures citywide for subsidized childcare for the last two calendar years and to report such achievements to the Council by July 1, 2008 before implementing Project Full Enrollment Initiative.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Administration for Children’s Services to achieve stated goals.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Bloomberg Administration to place a moratorium on the implementation of the Project Full Enrollment Initiative.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: The Bloomberg Administration to place a moratorium on the implementation of the Project Full Enrollment Initiative.
